extension.name: VM - Paymentsense
extension.author: Paymentsense Ltd.
extension.description: Paymentsense payment plugin for VirtueMart, allowing you to take payments via Paymentsense. The plugin provides integration with the Paymentsense Hosted payment method.

field.name: gateway_merchant_id
field.label: Gateway MerchantID
field.description: This is the gateway MerchantID not used with the MMS login, e.g. ABCDEF-1234567.

field.name: gateway_password
field.label: Gateway Password
field.description: This is the gateway Password not used with the MMS login. The Password should use lower case and uppercase letters, and numbers only.

field.name: gateway_presharedkey
field.label: Gateway PreSharedKey
field.description: Your PaymentSense Merchant Pre-Shared Key, as found in the PaymentSense Merchant Management System.

field.name: gateway_hash_method
field.label: Gateway Hash Method
field.description: This is the hash method set in MMS under 'Account Admin' > 'Account Settings'. By default, this will be SHA1.

field.name: force_notif_to_http
field.label: Force callback notification to use HTTP
field.description: This is forces the callback notification sent by the gateway to use HTTP instead of HTTPS. Default is 'No'.
